title: Building Happy Engineering Teams at Scale
description: Leadership in technology integrates both aspects of software engineering and leadership. Come out to learn more about how to foster a positive work environment in a SWE team.

title: Gen Z Entrepreneurship
description: Join founders of viral social apps and startups backed by the most prolific investors in Silicon Valley as they discuss the ups and downs of building a company as a Zoomer.

title: Breaking into PM From a Non-technical Background
description: Learn about how to tap into product management from a, non-technical background

title: The Future of Education, Today
description: Education hasn't seen much innovation for the past 100 years. With the initiatives our panelists are part of, it'll look radically different within the next 10.

title: Arming the Rebels with Commerce
description: The president of Shopify sits down with one of their largest merchants do discuss how Shopify's helping anyone get started with entreprenuership, no matter how small.

title: Creating a More Diverse Work Landscape
description: Join us in conversation with 2 senior leaders whoâ€™ve been fighting to promote diversity at big organizations. With tech growing rapidly, it's important we focus on diversity first.
